_header: I have forgive take heed thereto / I charge that thou no more do so
Note: For another version see next entry 2179, 5948.
_description: English verses in a story from the Gesta Romanorum — six couplets

OxfMagd93.First Lines:
y haue for ȝeue take hede þer toy charge þat þu
                    no more do so…
OxfMagd93.Last Lines:
…Now þu art nobyl & of worthy degrelose hyt noȝt
                    hertly y pray the
OxfMagd93.Note: Added to lower margin by scribe.
OxfMagd93.Editions:
Pfander,  Homer Garrison. 
             “The Popular Sermon of the Medieval Friar in England.” 
         Diss. New York University, 1937: 63.
